About the Company: India Motor Parts & Accessories Ltd is engaged in the distribution of automobile spare parts and accessories through its 50+ branch network representing over fifty manufacturers. IMPAL is one of the few all India distributors of motor parts and deals in engine group components, brake systems, fasteners, radiators, suspensions, axles, auto electricals, wheels, steering linkages, instrument clusters etc
